reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully, is comfortable, and appreciate its thick, stretchy fabric. The material quality receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's not see-through, and they describe it as very pretty. The length receives mixed reviews - while some find it perfect for their height, others say the bottom is too long. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others describe it as oversized. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress runs large. Material stretchy.
items.body: Dress is exactly as advertised. Good quality material and color...ordered black. Perfect for tall sizes. I am 5ft 208 curvy...more hits and thighs. Thankful dimples on thighs does not show through dress. Heavy weight material just enough not to fly up. Runs large size down for tighter fit. Satisfied overall. Read more
items.author: PG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it
items.body: The dress was amazing, I felt beautiful. The material is nice and thick and stretchy. It was well made and the price was reasonable .I didnt get the invisible strap others said they did recieve. There is a place on the dress to wear straps if you needed to. I am 5"5" and 240 lbs and I got a 2x and the length was perfect. I could have sized down because of the stretchy fabric but it was ok. Read more
items.author: Nadine w.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: Amazing look, fit, and feel for the price. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The perfect holiday dress
items.body: I ordered this dress for my companyâ€™s holiday party and Iâ€™m glad I did. The day of the holiday party it was 10Â° here in Chicago and when I tell you the material of this dress stood against the weather greatly. The fabric was thick and stretchy. Iâ€™m typically a size 18 and I am pretty tall standing at 5â€™8. The dress fit great and hung to the floor. I got so many compliments. The only thing that I wish was the ruffles around the dress were a little more exaggerated outside of that 10 out of 10 would definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: TaTiana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Beach Wedding Dress!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress; it was perfect for my October beach wedding. I am 5:2, 154 pounds; I ordered a Medium and it fit great. The material is somewhat stretchy, so I suggest not sizing up. Read more
items.author: Deirdre Lea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY beautiful dress

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Wedding Dress for Curvy Queens
items.body: I wore this dress as my wedding dress, and it was absolutely perfect! Itâ€™s beautiful, fun, and wonderfully playful. If youâ€™re a curvy queen like me, this dress highlights all the right places. I received so many compliments, and my husband loved how it showed off my natural curves. Truly a gorgeous dress! items.author: Jessie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Mermaid Off Shoulder Maxi Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Mermaid Off Shoulder Maxi Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Blue, Yellow, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
